markdownRemark.html: A good brief overview in English of the reception accorded the Jesuits, especially in university towns, is now available in the introduction to Paul F. Grendler's The University of Mantua, the Gonzaga, and the Jesuits, Baltimore, Hopkins, 2009, 16-23.
